about_the_game:
Imagine Whack-A-Mole... but with dicks. In this mini-game, you will find yourself trapped in a hole-filled box surrounded by more than 40 big red dicks. Press START and whack them off until time runs out! Then pass the headset to the next person at your party and see who can get the highest score!

Remember, you can't just grab them... you've got to whack them!

*This game was designed with Oculus Quest and Rift in mind. Additional access through OpenVR is in development.

Wicked Vixen has many more ideas for additional gameplay. This is an Early Access game that will have updates and additions over time. Have your own ideas? Send us an email!



@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
Support for SteamVR has just been added... contact us if you have any issues running on anything other than Oculus platforms.
If you have trouble, verify the install path. When you pull up Whack A Dick in your library you should see a gear icon to the right. In there, you should see a "Manage" option and then a "Browse Local Files" option. That should open your file explorer and you should see a folder that says "SteamVROnly." If you open that folder, you should see a "WhackADickProSteamVR.exe" file.
@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@

content_descriptors.notes: Realistic portrayals of sex toys.  Game interaction gestures are sexual in nature.

detailed_description:
Imagine Whack-A-Mole... but with dicks. In this mini-game, you will find yourself trapped in a hole-filled box surrounded by more than 40 big red dicks. Press START and whack them off until time runs out! Then pass the headset to the next person at your party and see who can get the highest score!

Remember, you can't just grab them... you've got to whack them!

*This game was designed with Oculus Quest and Rift in mind. Additional access through OpenVR is in development.

Wicked Vixen has many more ideas for additional gameplay. This is an Early Access game that will have updates and additions over time. Have your own ideas? Send us an email!



@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
Support for SteamVR has just been added... contact us if you have any issues running on anything other than Oculus platforms.
If you have trouble, verify the install path. When you pull up Whack A Dick in your library you should see a gear icon to the right. In there, you should see a "Manage" option and then a "Browse Local Files" option. That should open your file explorer and you should see a folder that says "SteamVROnly." If you open that folder, you should see a "WhackADickProSteamVR.exe" file.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or bett

name: Official Wicked Vixen Whack-A-Dick Pro

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Official Wicked Vixen Whack-A-Dick Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: Designed specifically for Oculus Quest, can also play on Rift.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: High End GPU, such as Desktop NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed specifically for Oculus Quest, can also play on Rift.

Press START and whack them off until time runs out! Then pass the headset to the next person at your party and see who can get the highest score!
